name: ELFAT (Elchemy) - Oleic Acid
description: ELFAT (Elchemy) is a chemical supplier offering high-quality Oleic Acid, a monounsaturated fatty acid found naturally in olive and canola oils. Oleic acid serves as a penetration enhancer and moisturizer in cosmetic, cooking, and industrial applications, essential for barrier repair formulations.
notes: Chemical supplier specializing in fatty acids and derivatives. Oleic acid is a monounsaturated omega-9 fatty acid naturally found in olive and canola oils. Serves as penetration enhancer and moisturizer in barrier repair formulations. Versatile applications across cosmetics, food, and industrial sectors. Essential component for lipid matrix formation and enhanced ingredient penetration.
